short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trigger the web core vitals metrics in order to display HeatMap on page and troubleshoot performance issue and diagnostic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables to display in real time the web core vitals on the page ; it maps visually LCP and CLS. It will help us to troubleshoot issues.
